thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Indivior Posts Q1 profit down 5 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indivior Posts Q1 profit down 5 pct
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Indivior PLC:
* Q1 NET REVENUE DECLINED 4 PCT (MINUS 6 PCT AT CONSTANT CURRENCY) TO $255M (Q1 2017: $265M)
* OPERATING PROFIT WAS $116M (Q1 2017: $128M) * NET INCOME WAS $93M (Q1 2017: $80M). ON AN ADJUSTED BASIS, NET INCOME DECLINED 3 PCT TO $78M IN Q1 2018 (Q1 2017: $80M), PRIMARILY REFLECTING A DECLINE IN OPERATING INCOME OFFSET BY LOWER FINANCING COSTS AND A REDUCED OVERALL EFFECTIVE TAX RATE.
* FULL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE RECONFIRMED * NET REVENUE EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $1,130M-$1,170M AND NET INCOME OF $290M-$320M
* GUIDANCE ASSUMES NO MATERIAL CHANGES IN MARKET CONDITIONS IN US Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
